bgu.spl.mics

Interface Message

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Broadcast, Request<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestCompleted

    public interface Message
    A message is a data-object which is passed between micro-services as a means of communication. The Message interface is a "Marker" interface which means that it is used only to mark other types of objects as messages. It does not contain any methods but every class that you want to send as a message (using the MessageBus) must implement it.
